answers.answer: MedZirka offers cost-free medical services online and offline, including free consultations, medical prescriptions, referrals, sick leave, vaccination certificates, and referrals for laboratory testing.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medzirka and read the section under 'Services provided by MedZirka'.

answers.answer: One can access MedZirka's cost-free medical services after submitting the declaration.

answers.answer: MedZirka provides free consultations from a family doctor, therapist, or pediatrician.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medzirka and read the section under 'Services provided by MedZirka'.

answers.answer: MedZirka's medical services are delivered both online and offline.

answers.answer: The content states that services are available 'After submitting the declaration', but does not specify what type of declaration is needed.

answers.answer: MedZirka can provide a medical prescription, sick leave, and a vaccination certificate.

answers.answer: MedZirka can issue referrals to a specialist and referrals for laboratory testing.

answers.answer: MedZirka addresses a wide range of health conditions including flu, cold, SARS, respiratory, circulatory, digestive, kidney, blood, endocrine, heart, and joint diseases, as well as chronic diseases of various etiologies.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medzirka and read the section under 'List of topics you can ask about'.

answers.answer: MedZirka addresses conditions such as flu, cold, SARS, bronchitis, pneumonia, bronchial asthma, hypertension, coronary heart disease, gastritis, peptic ulcer, pyelonephritis, anemia, diabetes mellitus, osteoarthritis, and gout, among others.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/medzirka and read the section under 'List of topics you can ask about'.

answers.answer: MedZirka addresses chronic diseases of various etiologies.

answers.answer: One can contact MedZirka by calling 0 800 330 553 or by writing on Viber/Telegram following the links on the website.
